content.raw:
Thank you.

I am currently getting the following error on import in Python 2:

‌

```python
>>> from pyteomics.auxiliary import unitstr
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "/home/lev/venv/pyteomics2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/pyteomics/auxiliary/__init__.py", line 8, in <module>
    from .structures import (
  File "/home/lev/venv/pyteomics2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/pyteomics/auxiliary/structures.py", line 263, in <module>
    class unitstr(str):
TypeError: Error when calling the metaclass bases
    nonempty __slots__ not supported for subtype of 'str'
```

I also get a bunch of prints on Python 3 when reading e.g.  mzML scans:

`None intern() argument 1 must be str, not None`

apparently coming from `_try_intern`
